desc.p: When a redemption Trade is done, the Trade(s) reference is updated in this field.
No input field automatically updated by the system
A No Input field that is updated with the date when a Redemption transaction is processed against an existing Purchase transaction(S)
No input field automatically updated by the system
The units that are redeemed from earlier purchase transaction(s) to meet the required units for redemption
No input field automatically updated by the system

ID of this file is held as Portfolio.ID.Fund.Master.Depository. File is updated when a Redemption transaction is processed against an earlier Purchase. Holds details of the debit and credit transaction(s) with respect to the same portfolio, fund and depository combinations
No input field automatically updated by the system
Multi-value set with update of the transaction price of each Trade, date wise when a Redemption in Funds is made for the same Portfolio vide the same Agent
No input field automatically updated by the system
Multi-value set to update the units transaction and date wise when a Purchase in Funds is made for the same Portfolio vide the same Agent
No input field automatically updated by the system

Field contains the date on which the Purchase transaction was done, from which the units are redeemed to meet Redemption of units. Multi-value set is updated whenever the same Portfolio enters a Purchase Trade in the same Fund Scheme through the same Agent
No input field automatically updated by the system
Reserved for future use
Reflects the balance units after a Redemption Trade has been done for this Fund, Portfolio, Agent combination. Multi-value field and has details of balance units
No input field automatically updated by the system
Multi-value set with credit amount of the redemption transaction(s) done against the purchases made earlier
No input field automatically updated by the system
Multi-value set with update of the transaction price of each Trade, date wise when a Purchase in Funds is made for the same Portfolio vide the same Agent
No input field automatically updated by the system
When a redemption Trade is done, the existing Trade(s) from which the units are redeemed is updated in this field
No input field automatically updated by the system
